para: Select &skel; &sgmts; that are heterogeneous. Any &sgmt; whose homogeneity is less than the given threshold will be selected.

caption.simpara: (a) A &skel; containing some heterogeneous &sgmts;. The pixels have been grouped by color, so &sgmts; straddling two colors are inhomogeneous.
(c) The same, but with threshold=0.5. Only one segment is selected. (Unless a segment crosses three or more pixel categories, it is impossible for its homogeneity to be less than 0.5.)
